name: Sokha
bio: A third-generation mango farmer, Sokha's passion is preserving the unique flavor of the Kor Romeat mango. Her farm is a haven of biodiversity.

name: Nary
bio: Nary champions innovative organic farming techniques, ensuring his mangoes are as pure as they are delicious. He loves sharing his knowledge with others.

name: Chantha
bio: Chantha's family has been farming the same land for over a century. He specializes in growing the sweetest mangoes, perfect for our dried fruit snacks.
